thread.title: Shakura
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Shakura

author: Shakura
title: Shakura
text: Great customer service, I was greeted the moment I walked in by more than one person. After asked what could they do to help me, I was taken right to the piece of furniture I came in for. Everything was quick and easy. They got me in and out without any hassle. I will recommend them to anyone and I will also be purchasing from this company again in the future.
